word:
Chap. 3 - Christ Our Righteousness

                         (An 1883 Presentation) 
MORNING TALK TO MINISTERS AT THE GENERAL CONFERENCE SESSION HELD IN NOVEMBER, 1883, AT BATTLE CREEK, MICHIGAN. PUBLISHED IN GOSPEL WORKERS (1892 EDITION), PP. 411-415, AND SELECTED MESSAGES, BOOK ONE, PP. 350-354. 


     "If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us our sins, and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness" (1 John 1:9).
